summary: This appears to be a cover sheet for an FBI FD-472 consent form signed by Bradley J. Edwards on October 28, 2009, related to the migration of items in the Epstein case. It indicates the acquisition of materials from Edwards.

persons.name: Bradley J Edwards
persons.context: Signed an FD-472 consent form on October 28, 2009, allowing the FBI to acquire or migrate items related to the Epstein case.

events.title: FD-472 Consent Form Signed
events.description: Bradley J. Edwards signed an FBI FD-472 consent form, authorizing the acquisition or migration of items in the Epstein case.

keyFacts: Bradley J. Edwards signed an FBI FD-472 consent form on October 28, 2009.
The document is a cover sheet for items migrated or acquired on that date.
The form is part of the FBI's records in the Epstein case (EFTA00108600).
